title: I cant recover my account "email bug"
body:
Hello, for first sorry for my english, ok, i try to recover my account, but i cant because the email on my account is incorrect y have the account name, and password, but i have 1 year that im not join the game, so when i login in the game, request me to change my password, and i change but appear that my password are incorrect and i cant recover my username or password or change email, because the email finish in "otmail" not "hotmail" how it need to be, so when i try to recover, dont send the email, what can i do? i have all the proof that the account are mine, i can send images to proof the situation but i think is insecure.
Thanks for the attention, i wait for answer.

replies.body:
We would like to help with your specific issue individually.  Please reach out to our account team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll respond as soon as possible.  Thanks for your patience!

CrazFight beat me to it!

Best thing you can do is send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), since trying to solve this over the boards could result in sensitive information being made public.
